sentences.en: China's lunar probing is serving entirely for the peaceful use of space.
sentences.cn: 中国的探月工程完全以和平利用空间为宗旨.

sentences.en: He didn't like the media probing into his past.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意媒体追问他的过去。

sentences.en: He kept probing the crusty snow with a pole.
sentences.cn: 他老是用一根杆子探测硬雪.

sentences.en: He stood there probing its shadows, tracing its lingering echoes.
sentences.cn: 他站在那观察它的阴影, 追寻萦回不散的回声.

sentences.en: His platoon was probing the enemy from an advanced position.
sentences.cn: 他的排正在前沿阵地外面搜索敌人.

sentences.en: His sharp, probing questions showed a quickness of mind.
sentences.cn: 他提的那些尖锐 、 盘根究底的问题都表明他思想敏捷.

sentences.en: If only there had been a course probing self - identity!
sentences.cn: 如果只出现了一门课程探索 自我 认同!

sentences.en: In reality, Israeli forces were probing in both directions, north and south.
sentences.cn: 实际上当时以色列的部队正在向南北两个方向挺进.

sentences.en: Probing into the Beauty of Art in O Captain, My Captain!
sentences.cn: 《啊,船长, 我的船长! 》的艺术美探析.

sentences.en: Squads of prison officers have been probing the rioters' defences.
sentences.cn: 几队狱警一直都在探察暴乱者的防卫情况。
这个表格问了一些试探性的问题。

sentences.en: They are probing into the cause of the crime.
sentences.cn: 他们正在探究犯罪的原因.

sentences.en: They asked a lot of probing questions .
sentences.cn: 他们提了许多盘根问底的问题。

sentences.en: They squared up and began to engage a probing attack.
sentences.cn: 他们摆好打架的架势,并开始了试探性的攻击.

sentences.en: When the development bubble burst, federal regulators started probing the balance sheets of the biggest banks.
sentences.cn: 房地产开发泡沫破灭后，联邦监管机构开始调查审计各家大型银行的资产负债表。

phrases.tran_cn: 探头检测；探测试验；探头试验
n. 传感探头，感测探针；敏感元件
温度探头；测温传感器；温度探测器；温度探针

trans.tran_cn: 探索的，寻根究底的，寻求真理的，（问题）深入锐利的

trans.tran_en: A probe is a long thin instrument that doctors and dentists use to examine parts of the body

trans.tran_cn: 探索，用探针（或探测器等）探查，探测( probe的现在分词 )，盘问，（用试探性袭击等）侦察（敌情），用尖物刺穿（物件）
